TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit WindowsPrincipal extends System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal

summary.span: Enables code to check the Windows group membership of a Windows user.

span.span: Enables code to check the Windows group membership of a Windows user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类主要用于检查 Windows 用户的角色。The class is primarily used to check the role of a Windows user. 方法重载使您可以通过使用不同的角色上下文中检查用户角色。The method overloads let you check the user role by using different role contexts. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法重载。The following example demonstrates how to use the method overloads. 枚举标识内置角色相对标识符 (Rid) 用作源。The enumeration is used as the source for the relative identifiers (RIDs) that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用于确定当前主体的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. remarks.format: ## Remarks 有四个重载此方法。There are four overloads for this method. 出于性能原因，强烈建议重载。For performance reasons, the overload is strongly recommended. > [!IMPORTANT] > Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持方法。The method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition.

returns.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group, that is, in a particular role; otherwise, .

span.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group, that is, in a particular role; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对新创建的角色的信息，例如新用户或新的组，进行测试时，必须注销并登录以强制在域内角色信息的传播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做会导致测试返回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 出于性能原因，重载建议用作的更可取的方法重载，以确定用户的角色。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当你尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时，可以使用同意对话框中动态提升你的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行的代码方法不会显示同意对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是内置的 Administrators 组中，代码返回如果您拥有标准用户角色，则为 false。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 之前通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行执行代码，可以将你的特权提升。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 相对标识符 (Rid) 支持的 Windows 用户组的安全标识符 (SID) 的组件和支持为了帮助防止跨平台本地化问题。Relative identifiers (RIDs) are components of a Windows user group's security identifier (SID) and are supported to help prevent cross-platform localization issues. 许多用户帐户、 本地组和全局组具有一个默认 RID 值，所有版本的 Windows 中是不变。Many user accounts, local groups, and global groups have a default RID value that is constant across all versions of Windows. 例如，为 BUILTIN\Administrators 角色 RID 是 0x220。For example, the RID for the BUILTIN\Administrators role is 0x220. 使用 0x220 的输入参数作为方法会导致`true`导致返回当前的主体是否是管理员。Using 0x220 as the input parameter for the method results in `true` being returned if the current principal is an administrator. 下表列出了默认 RID 值。The following tables list the default RID values. |内置的用户Built-in users|RIDRID| |---------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\AdministratorDOMAINNAME\Administrator|0x1F40x1F4| |DOMAINNAME\GuestDOMAINNAME\Guest|0x1F50x1F5| |内置的全局组Built-in global groups|RIDRID| |-----------------------------|---------| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 管理员DOMAINNAME\Domain Admins|0x2000x200| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 用户DOMAINNAME\Domain Users|0x2010x201| |DOMAINNAME\Domain 来宾DOMAINNAME\Domain Guests|0x2020x202| |内置的本地组Built-in local groups|RIDRID| |----------------------------|---------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators|0x2200x220| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users|0x2210x221| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests|0x2220x222| |BUILTIN\Account 运算符BUILTIN\Account Operators|0x2240x224| |BUILTIN\Server 运算符BUILTIN\Server Operators|0x2250x225| |BUILTIN\Print 运算符BUILTIN\Print Operators|0x2260x226| |BUILTIN\Backup 运算符BUILTIN\Backup Operators|0x2270x227| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator|0x2280x228| ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the methods. 枚举用作标识的内置角色的 rid 源。The enumeration is used as the source for the RIDs that identify the built-in roles. Rid 用于确定当前主体的角色。The RIDs are used to determine the roles of the current principal. [!code-cpp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: if the current principal is a member of the specified Windows user group; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 唯一标识用户或组在 Windows 2000、 Windows Server 和 Windows XP 的实现。The uniquely identifies a user or group on Windows 2000, Windows Server, and Windows XP implementations. 对新创建的角色的信息，例如新用户或新的组，进行测试时，必须注销并登录以强制在域内角色信息的传播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做会导致测试返回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当你尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时，可以使用同意对话框中动态提升你的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行的代码方法不会显示同意对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是内置的 Administrators 组中，代码返回如果您拥有标准用户角色，则为 false。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 之前通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行执行代码，可以将你的特权提升。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 出于性能原因，这是首选的重载，以确定用户的角色。For performance reasons, this is the preferable overload to determine a user's role. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 枚举值用于确定当前的主体是否为管理员。The enumeration value is used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅方法。For the full code example, see the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对新创建的角色的信息，例如新用户或新的组，进行测试时，必须注销并登录以强制在域内角色信息的传播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做会导致测试返回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 出于性能原因，重载建议用作的更可取的方法重载，以确定用户的角色。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当你尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时，可以使用同意对话框中动态提升你的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行的代码方法不会显示同意对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是内置的 Administrators 组中，代码返回如果您拥有标准用户角色，则为 false。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 之前通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行执行代码，可以将你的特权提升。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下面的示例使用枚举用于确定是否当前的主体。The following example uses the enumeration is used to determine whether the current principal is an . 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅方法。For the full code example, see the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对新创建的角色的信息，例如新用户或新的组，进行测试时，必须注销并登录以强制在域内角色信息的传播。When testing for newly created role information, such as a new user or a new group, it is important to log out and log in to force the propagation of role information within the domain. 不这样做会导致测试返回`false`。Not doing so can cause the test to return `false`. 在 Windows 98 或 Windows Millennium Edition 上不支持此方法。This method is not supported on Windows 98 or Windows Millennium Edition. 出于性能原因，重载建议用作的更可取的方法重载，以确定用户的角色。For performance reasons, the overload is recommended as the preferable overload for determining the user's role. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，用户帐户控制 (UAC) 决定用户的特权。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是内置的 Administrators 组的成员，将为您分配两个运行时访问令牌：一个标准用户访问令牌和一个管理员访问令牌。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 默认情况下，您拥有标准用户角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 当你尝试执行需要管理特权的任务时，可以使用同意对话框中动态提升你的角色。When you attempt to perform a task that requires administrative privileges, you can dynamically elevate your role by using the Consent dialog box. 执行的代码方法不会显示同意对话框。The code that executes the method does not display the Consent dialog box. 即使您是内置的 Administrators 组中，代码返回如果您拥有标准用户角色，则为 false。The code returns false if you are in the standard user role, even if you are in the Built-in Administrators group. 之前通过右键单击应用程序图标并指示需以管理员身份运行执行代码，可以将你的特权提升。You can elevate your privileges before you execute the code by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. 对于内置角色，`role`字符串应采用格式"BUILTIN\\*RoleNameHere*"。For built-in roles, the `role` string should be in the form "BUILTIN\\*RoleNameHere*". 例如，若要测试的 Windows 管理员角色的成员身份，表示角色的字符串应为"BUILTIN\Administrators"。For example, to test for membership in the Windows administrator role, the string representing the role should be "BUILTIN\Administrators". 请注意，可能需要对其进行转义反斜杠。Note that the backslash might need to be escaped. 下表列出的内置角色。The following table lists the built-in roles. > [!NOTE] > 字符串格式中的内置角色的拼写不同于在中使用的拼写枚举。The spelling for the BUILTIN roles in string format differs from the spelling used in the enumeration. 例如，在枚举中的管理员的拼写为"Administrator"，而不是"管理员"。For example, the spelling for an administrator in the enumeration is "Administrator", not "Administrators". 使用此重载时，使用下表中的角色的拼写正确。When using this overload, use the spelling for the role from the following table. |内置的本地组Built-in local groups| |----------------------------| |BUILTIN\AdministratorsBUILTIN\Administrators| |BUILTIN\UsersBUILTIN\Users| |BUILTIN\GuestsBUILTIN\Guests| |BUILTIN\Account 运算符BUILTIN\Account Operators| |BUILTIN\Server 运算符BUILTIN\Server Operators| |BUILTIN\Print 运算符BUILTIN\Print Operators| |BUILTIN\Backup 运算符BUILTIN\Backup Operators| |BUILTIN\ReplicatorBUILTIN\Replicator| 对于计算机特定角色，`role`字符串应采用格式"MachineName\\*RoleNameHere*"。For machine-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "MachineName\\*RoleNameHere*". 对于特定于域的角色，`role`字符串应采用格式"DomainName\\*RoleNameHere*"; 例如， `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`"。For domain-specific roles, the `role` string should be in the form "DomainName\\*RoleNameHere*"; for example, `"SomeDomain\Domain Users`". > [!NOTE] > .NET framework 版本 1.0，`role`参数是区分大小写。In the .NET Framework version 1.0, the `role` parameter is case-sensitive. 在.NET Framework 1.1 版以及更高版本，`role`参数不区分大小写。In the .NET Framework version 1.1 and later, the `role` parameter is case-insensitive. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 字符串`BUILTIN\Administrators`和`BUILTIN\Users`用于确定当前的主体是管理员或用户。The strings `BUILTIN\Administrators` and `BUILTIN\Users` are used to determine whether the current principal is an administrator or a user. 有关完整的代码示例，请参阅方法。For the full code example, see the method. [!code-csharp[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/CS/source.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Security.Principal.WindowsBuiltInRole Example/VB/source.vb#3)]
